CustomField.description: The type of job to be executed (e.g., 'ExecuteAction', 'FollowUpLLM', 'GraphStep'). Dictates how the payload is interpreted and routed to the appropriate processor.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies the processing type: ExecuteAction (tool execution), FollowUpLLM (continued conversation), or GraphStep (workflow execution). Required for proper event routing.
CustomField.label: Job Type
